mapper.insert: INSERT INTO knowledge_faq_embeddings ( faq_id, qa_role, model_name, model_version, provider, namespace, metric, dim, embedding, deleted, creator, create_time, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #{faqId}, #{qaRole}, #{modelName}, #{modelVersion}, #{provider}, #{namespace}, #{metric}, #{dim}, #{embedding}, COALESCE(#{deleted}, FALSE), #{creator}, NOW(), #{updater}, NOW() )

INSERT INTO knowledge_faq_embeddings ( faq_id, qa_role, model_name, model_version, provider, namespace, metric, dim, embedding, deleted, creator, create_time, updater, update_time ) VALUES
( #{item.faqId}, #{item.qaRole}, #{item.modelName}, #{item.modelVersion}, #{item.provider}, #{item.namespace}, #{item.metric}, #{item.dim}, #{item.embedding}, COALESCE(#{item.deleted}, FALSE), #{item.creator}, NOW(), #{item.updater}, NOW() )
